sentences.en: Celery Bok Choy Rhubarb and more look just like bones.
sentences.cn: 芹菜、青菜、大黄茎等等看起来很像骨头.

sentences.en: Celery, Bok Choy, Rhubarb and many more look just like bones.
sentences.cn: 芹菜 、 青菜 、 大黄茎和其他很多菜看起来就像骨头.

sentences.en: Chinese herbal medicines have Gentiana, Notopterygium, Cordyceps sinensis, rhubarb and so on.
sentences.cn: 中药材有秦艽 、 羌活 、 冬虫夏草 、 大黄等.

sentences.en: Chinese herbal medicines have Notopterygium, Gentiana, such as rhubarb.
sentences.cn: 中药材有羌活 、 秦艽 、 大黄等.

sentences.en: Effects and Symptoms: The rhubarb itself, is harmless and even healthy.
sentences.cn: 效果和症状: 大黄本身是无毒无害甚至是有益健康的.

sentences.en: From the low-growing Indian rhubarb to the mighty English maples, the plants in this region get ready for the winter with a cornucopia of colors.
sentences.cn: 从低速度生长的印度大黄到巨大的英国枫树，这一地区的植物用丰富的色彩为冬天的到来做好准备。

sentences.en: I had rhubarb tart with a lot of cream.
sentences.cn: 我吃了添加了许多奶油的大黄小馅饼.

sentences.en: Is the Chinese rhubarb dog of Home Zhou biting my hand?
sentences.cn: 周家的大黄狗咬没咬着我的手?

sentences.en: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together.
sentences.cn: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖，熬成汤药。

sentences.en: Methods: The contents of aloe - emodin in rhubarb decoctions were determined by RP - HPLC.
sentences.cn: 方法采用 反相 高效液相色谱法测定各种大黄煎液中芦荟大黄素的含量.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the effect of different habitats on rhubarb quality.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨生长环境对大黄质量的影响.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the effects of rhubarb for cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 目的观察生大黄治疗脑出血的临床疗效.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To solve the transparency problem of the compound rhubarb liquid.
sentences.cn: 目的: 解决复方大黄口服液的澄明度问题.

sentences.en: Seaweed, mushrooms, rhubarb, luxury products such as ephedra, famous nationwide.
sentences.cn: 发菜 、 蘑菇 、 大黄 、 麻黄等名贵特产, 誉满全国.

sentences.en: The cochinchina momordicae seed , rhubarb, liquorice root all contain anti - cancer activity components.
sentences.cn: [中英文摘要]木鳖子 、 黄和甘草均含有抗癌活性成分.

sentences.en: The cochinchina seed, rhubarb, root all contain anti - cancer activity components.
sentences.cn: 木鳖子 、 大黄和甘草均含有抗癌活性成分.

trans.tran_cn: 大黄，<口>（后台演员造的）人声喧哗效果，乱嚷嚷
trans.tran_en: a plant with broad leaves. It has thick red stems that can be cooked and eaten.
